data.title: Bondi Partners
data.meta_description:
Bondi Partners | 3,354 followers on LinkedIn. In an increasingly complex world, we put the puzzle together. | Bondi Partners is an advisory and investment firm which sits at the critical intersection of policy, politics, and the private sector.

In an increasingly complex world, where governments are becoming more deeply entrenched across all sectors and industries, we draw on our unique experience and networks to interpret, forecast and manage opportunities and risks for our clients. 

From market entry to supply chain challenges, mergers and acquisitions to investment, we build a roadmap to success and share the journey with you.

Our DC team was delighted to partner with Australian Women in DC (AWDC) to host a political panel event discussing what has and will continue to be an unprecedented U.S. election campaign. Our panelists representing Bondi Partners Emma Doyle and Amy K. Dacey were joined by journalists Ahtra Elnashar and Cate Cadell who all shared insights into how the election will play out in America and the effect it will have on the rest of the world. Itâ€™s a fascinating time to be in DC!

Our Global President The Hon. Ambassador Joe Hockey (ret.) talked exclusively to Australia's Ambassador the U.S. Kevin Rudd at the Republican National Convention about what a Trump 2.0 presidency would look like in America and for the world. Watch the full interview for Sky News Australia at https://lnkd.in/e2yPEvUi #rnc2024 #uspolitics

Our Global President The Hon. Ambassador Joe Hockey (ret.) has previously spoken with Donald Trump him about the possibly of an attempt on the former President's life. "I think he thought this was a very real risk for him," Joe told Paul Murray on Sky News Australia. "This will have an impact on Donald Trump, let's be real about it, he has come within one inch of dying." Watch the full interview at: https://lnkd.in/e5H2Cnna

Joe Biden is, no doubt, hoping the Republican National Convention will be a circuit breaker for him, and put America's focus back on Donald Trump. I'll be on the ground in Milwaukee with Sky News Australia to find out if Trump 2.0 can remain disciplined and to gather insights into what another Trump presidency would mean for the U.S. and the world. Bondi Partners #uselection #convention

Our US team welcomed business leaders from across Australia and New Zealand to Washington DC to kick off the SelectUSA 2024 Investment Summit. As our CEO Americas Chelsey Martin explained, there are endless opportunities in America for innovative AU and NZ companies once they cut through the complexity and noise in the US market. Thanks to Steve Knode and Georgie Harrowell from the U.S. Department of Commerce for making us a part of your packed schedule! #selectusa #innovation #growth

As global military spending reached a record US$2.443 trillion in 2023 and is set to continue to grow, Bondi Partners Australian CEO Anthony Lazzoppina is backing national security as one of the strongest investment thematics. Speaking to ausbiz about Australia's first national security fund, 1941, Anthony explained that national security will continue to be important in 10 years, 20 years and beyond because it underpins all other investment classes and our way of life. "There is a huge desire to invest in local Australian business but it can't just be left to the Government. Private sector has a strong role to play. Plus the onset of AUKUS and Quad means these businesses now have an opportunity to sell to multiple governments," he said. Learn more about the 1941 Fund at our website and watch the full interview at the link below. #investment #nationalsecurity #aukus https://lnkd.in/g6YmdqxC
